CustomField.description: Provides an example of what the output will look like for Notices of Hearing based on the selected values for Hearing Output Type and Operating Under Fictitious Name fields.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Hearing_Output_Type__c , "An Individual" , "As an individual defendant." , "Operating Under Fictitious Name" , "As the person operating under the fictitious name of " + Operating_Under_Fictitious_Name__c + "." , "On Behalf of Employer" , "On behalf of " + Case_Role__r.Case__r.Employer__r.Name + ", " + TEXT( Case_Role__r.Case__r.Employer__r.Legal_Entity_Descriptor__c ) + "." , NULL )
CustomField.label: Hearing Output Preview
